tool_description: Tracks and analyzes chargeback data including rates, reasons, dispute outcomes, and financial impact on transaction processing.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

include_dispute_outcomes.description: Whether to analyze dispute resolution outcomes

chargeback_reason_analysis.description: Whether to categorize chargebacks by reason codes

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
No chargeback data found: Transaction data must contain chargeback records for analysis.
Insufficient chargeback data: At least 3 chargebacks required for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id containing chargeback information, optionally enable detailed dispute outcome and reason code analysis for comprehensive chargeback tracking.

chargeback_rate.description: Percentage of transactions that resulted in chargebacks

total_chargeback_amount.description: Total monetary amount of all chargebacks

dispute_win_rate.description: Percentage of disputed chargebacks won by merchant

chargeback_reasons.description: Breakdown of chargeback reason codes and frequencies

chargeback_trends.description: Analysis of chargeback trends and patterns over time
